actions.name: Phantom Body
actions.description: Effect: Increases the Power of the user's Ghost-Type attacks by 50%.

actions.name: Phantom Body
actions.description: Passive: The user is also immune to the damage and effects of damaging Fighting-Type and Normal-Type attacks and uses the attack Curse and is affected by Gloomy Weather as if a Ghost-Type.

system.description: Effect: Increases the Power of the user's Ghost-Type attacks by 50%. Passive: The user is also immune to the damage and effects of damaging Fighting-Type and Normal-Type attacks and uses the attack Curse and is affected by Gloomy Weather as if a Ghost-Type.
